Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\grid\GridViewAsset

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\grid\GridViewAsset » yii\web\AssetBundle » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
This asset bundle provides the javascript files for the yii\grid\GridView widget.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$sourcePath yii\grid\GridViewAsset
$basePath string The Web-accessible directory that contains the asset files in this bundle yii\web\AssetBundle
$baseUrl string The base URL that will be prefixed to the asset files for them to be accessed via Web server yii\web\AssetBundle
$depends yii\grid\GridViewAsset
$js yii\grid\GridViewAsset
$css array List of CSS files that this bundle contains yii\web\AssetBundle
$jsOptions array The options that will be passed to yii\web\View::registerJsFile() when registering the JS files in this bundle yii\web\AssetBundle
$cssOptions array The options that will be passed to yii\web\View::registerCssFile() when registering the CSS files in this bundle yii\web\AssetBundle
$publishOptions array The options to be passed to \yii\grid\AssetManager::publish() when the asset bundle is being published yii\web\AssetBundle
